page.title: 12 A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Ruth Stephanie Close,}I am nine years old and live with my mum, dad and brother Simon who is 12. Most mornings my mum goes out to work at 7a.m. but always brings me a cup of tea first.By 7.45 I am out of bed, washed,dressed and down stairs for breakfast,if I am not my dad gets grumpy (he's a teacher by the way). After breakfast I call for my friends and we walk to school, it's about half a mile.Mine is a small school which I like very much. My favourite weekday is Wednesday because after school I go to a lady called Mary's house where I am learning to spin and weave wool, we are also being taught about dying wool and making felt.Mary teaches my mum too.After this I play for a while, have my tea,do my homework,watch T.V. and then go to bed (as late as I can).
